00009 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
00010 //Abstract File class
00011 //--------------------------------------------------------------------
00012 class FileClass
00013 {
00014 public:
00015         //Destructor
00016         virtual ~FileClass() RX;
00017         //FileClass
00018         virtual const char* GetFileName() = 0;
00019         virtual const char* SetFileName(const char* pFileName) = 0;
00020         virtual int CreateFile() = 0;
00021         virtual int DeleteFile() = 0;
00022         virtual bool Exists(const char* pFileName) = 0; //If pFileName is NULL, use own.
00023         virtual bool HasHandle() = 0;
00024         virtual bool Open(int nFileAccess) = 0;
00025         virtual bool OpenEx(const char* pFileName, int nFileAccess) = 0;
00026         virtual int ReadBytes(void* pBuffer, int nNumBytes) = 0; //Returns number of bytes read.
00027         virtual int MoveFilePointer(int nDistance, DWORD dwMoveMethod) = 0;     
00028         //dwMoveMethod:
00029         //0 = SEEK_SET
00030         //1 = SEEK_CUR
00031         //2 = SEEK_END
00032         virtual int GetFileSize() = 0;
00033         virtual int WriteBytes(void* pBuffer, int nNumBytes) = 0; //Returns number of bytes written.
00034         virtual void Close() = 0;
00035         virtual DWORD GetFileTime() R0; //LoWORD = FatTime, HiWORD = FatDate
00036         virtual bool SetFileTime(DWORD FileTime) R0;
00037         virtual void CDCheck(DWORD dwUnk, DWORD dwUnk2, DWORD dwUnk3) = 0;
00038 
00039         FileClass() { };
00040 
00041 protected:
00042         FileClass(bool) { }
00043 
00044         //Properties
00045         PROPERTY(bool,                  SkipCDCheck);
00046         PROPERTY(int,                   FileAccess);            //0 = FILE_ANY_ACCESS
00047                                                                                                 //1 = FILE_READ_ACCESS
00048                                                                                                 //2 = FILE_WRITE_ACCESS
00049 };

00054 class RawFileClass : public FileClass
00055 {
00056 public:
00057         //Destructor

00059         //FileClass
00060         //FileClass
00061         virtual const char* GetFileName() R0;
00062         virtual const char* SetFileName(const char* pFileName) R0;

00067         virtual bool Open(int nFileAccess) R0;
00068         virtual bool OpenEx(const char* pFileName, int nFileAccess) R0;
00069         virtual int ReadBytes(void* pBuffer, int nNumBytes) R0;
00070         virtual int MoveFilePointer(int nDistance, DWORD dwMoveMethod) R0;
00071         virtual int GetFileSize() R0;
00072         virtual int WriteBytes(void* pBuffer, int nNumBytes) R0;
00073         virtual void Close() RX;
00074         virtual void CDCheck(DWORD dwUnk, DWORD dwUnk2, DWORD dwUnk3) RX;
00075 
00076         //Constructor
00077         RawFileClass(const char* pFileName) : FileClass(false)
00078                 JMP_THIS(0x65CA80);
00079 
00080 protected:
00081         RawFileClass(bool X) : FileClass(X) { }
00082         RawFileClass() : FileClass(false) { }
00083
